text: 11.13 Lom 16.18, 2 Ko 2.17, Gal 1.7, Plp 3.2, 2 Pi 2.1, Lep 2.2 Bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb yepɨs mɨdebal okok, Jisas wog gobun agɨl yepɨs gɨpal. Kɨli gos anɨgɨl nepal. Binɨb ogɨnap kɨli chɨnop nɨŋɨd, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok mɨdobun gos ak nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, gos anɨb ak nepal. Anɨgɨl nɨŋɨd, sɨlok lɨl bɨ anɨb ak ke mɨdebal.
